page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There have been great changes in the {employment}situation in the past decade with a general decline in traditional industries like {textiles} for example there used to be a shirt factory in Lanark and one out at the new {Industrial Estate}at Caldwellside. There are however two knitware factories ,which are still surviving despite strong overseas competition. There is no large scale employer apart from {New Lanark} Consevation Trust ,which has a large Manpower services' workforce. The emphasis is on small scale factory units such as those at the {Industrial {Estate}at Caldwellside.The {District {Council}have recently encouraged the development of another small { {Industrial Estate }in Lanark itself.Finally it is to be noted that many people work outside the town.
